voice.text: Don't my chest look sexy with this shirt on?
Buy any of my items, and I'll rub my nipples for you!

parameter.value: I'm glad you we were able to get to know one another.
Wait, come back! I didn't mean you touch you there!
I'm sorry, is my chest distracting you?
As a matter of fact, I do work out. Now if you can staring at my body, feel free to {trade}.
